attributes.action: encourage greener travel by placing heavier taxes on passengers taking internal flights (e.g. Heathrow to Newquay) and helping train companies compete through more competative pricing and more reliable services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unnecessary flights within the UK can be avoided by alternative methods such as the train.  The government should be commited to greener travel and a better, more competative rail systems would not just benefit the environment but commuters on a daily basis.  With the concerns over the environment that we have, it should never be cheaper to fly to a destination in the UK than it is to take the train.
